00044 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00045 
00046 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00047 #include "Trace.h"
00048 
00049 #include <iostream>
00050 
00051 InstanceNode::InstanceNode( SoNode* node )
00052 : m_coinNode( node ), m_parent( 0 ) 
00053 {
00054         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::InstanceNode" );
00055 }
00056 
00057 InstanceNode::InstanceNode( const InstanceNode* node )
00058 {
00059         
00060 
00061         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::InstanceNode" );
00062         m_coinNode = node->m_coinNode;
00063         node->m_coinNode->ref();
00064         m_parent = node->m_parent;
00065         
00066         
00067         for( int index = 0; index < node->children.count(); index++ ) 
00068     {
00069         InstanceNode* child = new InstanceNode(*(node->children[index]));
00070         
00071         children.append(child);
00072     }
00073 
00074         
00075 }
00076 
00077 InstanceNode::~InstanceNode()
00078 {
00079         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::~InstanceNode" );
00080         qDeleteAll( children );
00081 }
00082 
00083 void InstanceNode::SetParent( InstanceNode* parent )
00084 {
00085         m_parent = parent;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void InstanceNode::SetNode( SoNode* node )
00089 {
00090         m_coinNode = node;
00091 }
00092 
00093 SoNode* InstanceNode::GetNode() const
00094 {
00095         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::GetNode" );
00096         return m_coinNode;
00097 }
00098 
00099 InstanceNode* InstanceNode::GetParent() const
00100 {
00101         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::GetParent" );
00102         return m_parent;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void InstanceNode::Print( int level ) const
00106 {
00107         Trace trace( "InstanceNode::Print" );
00108         for( int i = 0; i < level; i++ ) std::cout << " ";
00109     std::cout << m_coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() << " has " << children.size() << " children "<<std::endl;
00110     for( int index = 0; index < children.count(); index++ ) 
00111     {
00112         children[index]->Print( level++ );
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 void InstanceNode::AddChild( InstanceNode* child )
00117 {
00118     children.append( child );
00119     child->SetParent( this );
00120 }
00121 
00122 void InstanceNode::InsertChild( int row, InstanceNode* instanceChild)
00123 {
00124         if( row > children.size() ) row = children.size();
00125         children.insert( row, instanceChild);
00126         instanceChild->SetParent(this);
00127 }
00128 
00129 QDataStream & operator<< ( QDataStream & s, const InstanceNode & node )
00130 {
00131         s << node.m_coinNode;
00132         return s;
00133 }
00134 
00135 QDataStream & operator>> ( QDataStream & s, const InstanceNode & node )
00136 {
00137         s >> node;
00138         return s;
00139 }
00140 
00141 bool operator==(const InstanceNode& thisNode,const InstanceNode& otherNode)
00142 {
00143         return ( (thisNode.GetNode() == otherNode.GetNode()) && 
00144                         (thisNode.GetParent()->GetNode()==otherNode.GetParent()->GetNode()));
00145 }
